nodes.text: The Corellian Foray Flyer 56, also known as CFF-56, was an airspeeder used by Leia Organa. It was carried in the cargo bay of the Tantive IV.

It was extensively modified for her use, with upgraded armor and numerous concealed weapons including a retractable blaster cannon. It had a sophisticated sensor system, reconnaissance and surveillance technology and a Ealewon Electronics DCD-4800 Cryptographic Coder.
